definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: Quasi-associated Mode is a special non-associated signaling operation.
sentences.chinese: 準隨路方式是一種特殊的非隨路信令操作。

sentences.english: The CHG:SLK command is used to change the minor state of a signaling link.
sentences.chinese: slk命令用於更改信令鏈路的次級狀態。

sentences.english: This information is sent as a setup message by the signaling gateway back to the MGC.
sentences.chinese: 這種消息作爲建立的消息由信令網關發回給mgc。

sentences.english: This paper presents the meaning of signaling network in Telecommunication supporting networks.
sentences.chinese: 信令網是通信網絡的重要支撐網之一。

sentences.english: The first implementation was to support SS7, followed by BRI.
sentences.chinese: 第一個實施情況，支持7號信令，由亮其次。

sentences.english: For each core network domain, at most one signalling connection may exist at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 信令連接用於在用戶設備和核心網之間傳輸上層信息。

sentences.english: The procedure uses non-UE associated signalling.
sentences.chinese: 該過程採用非UE相關的信令。

sentences.english: The CHG :SLK command is used to change the minor state of a signaling link.
sentences.chinese: SLK命令用於改變某個信令鏈路的次級狀態。

sentences.english: Transporting codes of relevant signaling message are emulated and transported based on serial lines.
sentences.chinese: 相關信令消息的傳輸碼基於串行線仿真和傳輸。

sentences.english: Key Problems of Realizing SCCP Connection-oriented Operations in the Signaling System No.
sentences.chinese: 七號信令中SCCP面向連接業務實現的關鍵問題。

sentences.english: Both Signalling and user data may be subject to ciphering.
sentences.chinese: 信令和用戶數據都應被加密。

sentences.english: In turn, the relevant address information is passed from a signaling gateway to an MGC.
sentences.chinese: 反過來，有關的地址信息通過信令網關傳送給MGC。

sentences.english: Chapter 4 discusses the implementation of signalling exchange software of SIPG.
sentences.chinese: 第四章給出了SIPG網關信令交換軟件的實現。

sentences.english: Otherwise the procedure uses non-UE associated signalling.
sentences.chinese: 否則該過程將採用非UE相關的信令。

sentences.english: It is based on the availability of channel interoffice signaling.
sentences.chinese: 該項業務建立在共路局間信令可用性的基礎上。
